description:
The list of Scooby Doo Games:
(The numbering is of my subjective opinion. If there isnâ€™t any platform specified, itâ€™s for the PC. The syntax goes like this: Number, Franchise name, title name, year of release and platform. Emulators are included)

1. Scooby-Doo â€“ 1986 (ZX Spectrum)

4. Scooby-Doo: Showdown in Ghost Town, 5. Scooby-Doo: Phantom of the

17. Scooby-Doo Who's Watching Who 2006 (DS+PSP)
18. Scooby-Doo First Frights 2009
19. Scooby-Doo the Spooky Swamp 2010
20. Scooby-Doo My Friend Scooby-Doo! 2015 (Android)
